name: Scrapship Demo
description:
After discovering some of the new features in QB64, I was inspired to make this top-down shooter.

A week of vacation and about 900 lines of code later I was able to get the game to the demo state that is available on this page.

This first demo version allows the player to:

Collect scrap that is randomly generated.

Shoot down fighters with one of two weapons selected with A or D keys . Fighters are reskinned as damage is applied! 

Future versions will focus on:

Different enemies, projectiles and bosses.

A plot

Improved graphics

and many other improvements, small and large!

Thanks for reading and I hope you enjoy the demo!
